DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.025 % vehicle treat ocular redness population adult geriatric participant ocular redness .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution Adult Geriatric Subjects With Ocular Redness .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age . Have history redness relief drop use , express desire use drop redness relief , within last 6 month . Have ocular health within normal limit include calculate bestcorrected visual acuity 0.3 logMAR good eye , measure use ETDRS chart . Any ocular/systemic health problem . Use disallowed medication .
